title: Sidewall, 1948–58
inscribed: Printed on selvage: "RUN I, TRIM HERE, JOIN HERE, WASHABLE, 22 X 370, U.W.P.C. OF N.A. UNION MADE"
description: White rabbits dressed as "can-can" dancers, artists, swimmers, or as fine ladies and gentlemen. Clothing is red, pink, blue, yellow, and green with metallic gold on a black ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1948–58.
1948–58. Machine-printed. Gift of Suzanne Lipschutz. 1991-89-151.
